description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Seafood & Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pasta With Seafood & Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the seafood into the tomato mixture for the last few minutes of cooking. Season well with salt and black pepper, stir in the parsley, then toss with the pasta.
